text: Kim Christian Beazley, AC (born 14 December 1948), is an Australian politician. He is the Governor of Western Australia since May 2018. He was the deputy prime minister of Australia and leader of the Opposition. He worked for the Hawke and Keating Governments before later serving as Ambassador to the United States. He is seen by political commentators as the "best Prime Minister Australia never had". ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of Australia Category:Governors of Western Australia
title: Kim Beazley
